message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose something fair. This is a long game, let's not drag it out.
You wanted to be quick, I want to be quicker
This is getting us nowhere.  Let's split the difference from our previous offers and end this.
You want to split the difference? I'll take a bit more instead
This is my final offer. Accept it, or the deal is off the table.
You said that was your final offer? I don't think so
